name: Client project Notion template
description: The beautiful client tracker that has been ~Marie Poulin~ized and made better. :)This is ideally for freelance copywriters/content writers, but I'm sure people in any kind of freelance trade could find some use in it! Plus, Marie Poulin directly helped create this and who doesn't want a Marie template?Databases included:- Client tracker- Project tracker- Meeting and notes- Projects- Swipe file- Content (aka each individual piece)
